home.text_base_description: Nestled in the treetops on 'celebrity row'. This incredible, unique and gated home provides the perfect escape from city life. Truly a private oasis. Surrounded by nature from every window and a backyard w/ endless outdoor living spaces. As soon as you enter the home you are greeted w/ views of nature and abundant natural light. The two story entrance adds to the open floor plan on the first floor. The modern designer kitchen overlooks the dining area & formal living rm. Floor to ceiling windows & sliding doors onto the deck allow for indoor/outdoor living year round. Moving upstairs the natural light & views of nature continue. The generously sized master suite continues w/ floor to ceiling windows & a balcony the width of the room. A large, beautifully remodeled master closet & bathroom complete this perfect suite. The second floor also boasts a beautiful sitting area w/ built in bookshelves as well as a large bedroom with en suite bathroom. The bottom floor is home to another bedroom with en-suite, a laundry room and a large family room perfect for entertaining guests with more floor to ceiling sliders that open to an outdoor dining area. Words do not do justice to the ample outdoor space that continues on. A waterfall with a beautiful mature koi pond, deck large enough to host 100's of people, fire pit with seating for 15 and plus a large flat yard. There is off street parking for 5 cars including the garage. Renderings are for backyard renovation that include a pool.

home_facts.Community: C03 - Sunset Strip - Hollywood Hills West
